Speeches advocating open sedition  鼓动公开叛乱的讲话. 收藏反馈  15.  An advocate of guild socialism. 基尔特社会主义者基尔特社会主义的提倡者收藏反馈.
the source revealed that the ad hoc group will examine the existing laws on sedition , and to explore how to extend to the Internet .消息透露，专案小组将研究现有的煽动法令，并探讨如何将其延伸至互联网。
